duties_responsibilities.duty: Work in the ServiceNow Program developing innovative solutions that simplifies customer services.
Maintain deep, comprehensive knowledge of ServiceNow’s capabilities and offerings.
Architect and design solutions for complex business problems using ServiceNow best practices and standards.
Deliver hands-on configuration, development and integrations within different modules of ServiceNow.
Experience in integrations, data design , data mapping from multiple data sources and tools is a must have.
Understanding of DevOps principles and CI/CD pipelines.
Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate.
Engaging presentation style, with the ability to control and manage multiple presentation scenarios.
Experience in documenting the technical solutions and test use case documentation with acceptance criteria well defined.

education_certification.credential: CIS is any one of ITSM & ITOM product suite is preferred
